Nothing too fancy - just a good editing.

Please start the cover letter with the word "Football" so I know you've read the description.

I'm looking to hire someone in the next hour and get it done asap.

item.title: Video Editor for Website Graphics/Animation - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to help us create short videos for our website. The videos will involve adding graphics and animations over still images to make them more engaging and visually appealing. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of video editing techniques, as well as experience and proficiency in using video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro.

Here’s an example of what we need: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1HNiSaQ8Rp4WwsEGnb3Gl26VQGc3t7ZV7/view?usp=drivesdk

The example is also attached to this job posting.

Responsibilities:
- Add graphics and animations to still images
- Ensure smooth transitions and synchronization of audio and video
- Edit and enhance video footage

Requirements:
- Proven experience as a video editor
- Proficiency in video editing software
- Familiarity with motion graphics and animation
- Strong attention to detail
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines

If you are creative, detail-oriented, and have a passion for video editing, we would love to hear from you!

Hourly Range: $15.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 14, 2024 15:38 UTC
Category: Visual Effects
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Animation, Video Editing, Graphic Design
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Animation, Video Editing, Graphic Design
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Support - Photo and Video Reels - Upwork
item.description:
**Title: Simple Reel Editor Needed for LinkedIn Business Page**

**Description:**
Seeking a video editor to create straightforward reels for my LinkedIn business page. I sell apartment buildings and want polished content for property sales and events.

**Project Details:**
I need reels that are simple yet curated to fit my brand. Content will include property highlights and event coverage. I'll provide images and content, aiming for a consistent look akin to our sales proposals.

**Requirements:**
- Proficiency in video editing
- Experience with business reels, preferably in real estate
- Ability to maintain brand consistency

**Attachments:**
Sample image examples of the style/type that I want created and a sales proposal for reference of the content.

**Deliverables:**
Edited reels reflecting provided content in a polished manner

**Experience Required:**
Candidates with prior reel editing experience, especially in business settings, are encouraged to apply. Please share relevant portfolio samples.

**How to Apply:**
Send your portfolio and any relevant experience for consideration. Looking forward to collaborating!

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 14, 2024 15:37 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Instagram Reels, Real Estate Video, Social Media Video, Graphic Design, Video Editing
Skills: Instagram Reels, Real Estate Video, Social Media Video, Graphic Design, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Same Day Video Edit - Upwork
item.description:
This project will be very straightforward.  I have a 12 minute video that is straightforward.  It is an interview with a car dealership and for a class, I need to edit it down to 8 minutes. Feel free to take out parts that you may feel are unnecessary, but the interview is about leadership and management skills.  I would also ask that you edit out the dog toy noise through the first few minutes of the video.  Last, I would need a transcript for the video.  I need it by today, Friday June 14 and am willing to award a bonus for doing so!  Thank you.  The video file is too large to attach to this job post so I will need to email it to you upon accepting the job.  

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 14, 2024 15:34 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Dialogue Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing
Skills: Audio Editing, Dialogue Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editing and Social Media Content Creation - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor and content creator to help us enhance and optimize our raw drone footage. Your main responsibilities will include editing the videos to enhance colors, adjust speed, and integrate music to create visually appealing and engaging content. Additionally, you will be creating IG reels and tiktoks to increase our social media presence.

  Required skills:
  - Video editing
  - Color correction
  - Speed adjustment
  - Music integration
  - Social media content creation

  We are a small team seeking a freelancer who can work with us on a project basis. The duration of the project is expected to be under 1 month, but may extend based on performance and project requirements.

  This job requires an intermediate level of expertise in video editing and content creation. The ideal candidate should have experience in creating captivating social media content and be familiar with platforms like Instagram and TikTok.

Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
Posted On: June 14, 2024 15:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects

item.description:
We are looking for a talented individual to create engaging TikTok and Instagram videos for our brand. The ideal candidate must have a deep understanding of the latest social media trends and be able to create captivating videos that resonate with our target audience. You will be responsible for brainstorming video concepts, filming, editing, and adding relevant effects and music. Attention to detail and the ability to work with tight deadlines is crucial. Proficiency in video editing software, such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro, is required. The ability to create visually appealing thumbnails and captions is a plus.

item.title: Edit Music and Repost YouTube Videos with Copywriting - Upwork
item.description:
We need assistance with a real estate agent's YouTube channel. The task is to download videos from the main firm's YouTube page using a downloader, change the music on the video, and reload the video to the real estate agent's YouTube account.

We will give you access to new licensable music you can use on each video. The music for the first few videos was changed using CapCut. You will need to know how to create engaging YouTube headlines and Thumbnails to go with the video. The videos are all home tours, so you can either screenshot the home or use a picture from the internet of the actual home. We already have a template in Canva that you can use. We attached an example of the thumbnail. Only the money text and image would need to change. We will have a template and tags you can use for scheduling each YouTube video. Each scheduled video process will change very little.

As you can see, there are a few repetitive steps to do with only entry-level skills needed. We are paying $250 per month to schedule two videos per day for the month. You can work ahead, so if you get them all scheduled you can be paid and then acquire another month if you wish! There are over 5,000 videos we can use so plenty of opportunity for a long-term position.

Budget: $250
Posted On: June 14, 2024 15:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Content Writing, Copywriting, Writing, Social Media Marketing, Video Post-Editing, YouTube
Skills: Video Editing, Content Writing, Copywriting, Writing, Social Media Marketing, Video Post-Editing, YouTube
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Social Media Platforms - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video editor to create engaging short videos for our social media platforms including Instagram, YouTube, and TikTok. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of the requirements and trends for each platform to ensure the videos are optimized for maximum reach and engagement. The main responsibilities of this role include editing raw footage, adding relevant graphics and effects, selecting appropriate music, and ensuring the final videos are of high quality.

Skills required:
- Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro
- Ability to work with multiple file formats and resolutions
- Knowledge of social media platforms and their video requirements
- Creativity and an eye for detail
- Strong communication and collaboration skills

This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months, and we are looking for an intermediate-level video editor who has prior experience in editing videos for social media platforms.

Hourly Range: $6.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 14, 2024 14:49 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial

item.description:
We have internally created a 2 min testimonial video from about 20 mins of filmed footage. I have included the intro at the beginning, outro at the end and some upbeat music in between.

item.title: After Effects Video Editor for Music Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an expert After Effects video editor to join our team and work on editing music videos. The ideal candidate must have a strong portfolio showcasing their skills in creating visually stunning and engaging music videos. You should be able to work with raw footage and transform it into a high-quality final product using After Effects. Attention to detail and a creative mindset are essential for this role.

    **Responsibilities:**
    - Edit music videos using After Effects
    - Enhance footage with visual effects and motion graphics
    - Collaborate with the team to ensure the videos meet the client's requirements

    **Requirements:**
    - Expertise in After Effects
    - Proven experience in editing music videos
    - Strong understanding of visual storytelling and composition
    - Ability to work under tight deadlines

    This is a large project that will last for more than 6 months. We are looking for an expert who can bring their creativity and technical expertise to deliver exceptional results.

item.title: Youtube Content Creator/Editor for Sword/History Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are a sword company owned by myself with a background in SEO and PR. As we venture into video marketing, we are looking for a content creatorl with skills in video creation, production, and editing to join our team.

We are seeking someone with a deep passion for history and sword making, who also possesses video creation, production, and editing skills. The ideal candidate will help us produce a variety of video content for our audience.

Video Content Types:

1. Faceless Videos with Technical Illustrations/Images:
   - Example: Efficient Engineer Video / https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PaGJwOPg2kU&t=2s&ab_channel=TheEfficientEngineer
   - Topics: "Best Steel for Swords" or "Sword Parts and Their Meaning"
   - Responsibilities: Create videos that explain technical aspects of swords using illustrations and images.

2.  Videos Featuring a Person Using Swords:

   - Collaborate with YouTubers and swordsmen.
   - Responsibilities: Edit videos to make them more engaging, incorporating graphics and humor.

Example:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WBESIyEInW0&ab_channel=Cerberusarms

Additional Content:

-  Shorts: Create short, engaging videos from the main content for platforms like YouTube, TikTok, and Instagram.

Skills Required:

1. Video Editing
2. Video Creation with Technical Illustrations (Optional) - We can have a technical illustrator provide graphics to you.
3. Content Creation for YouTube
4. Content Creation for TikTok/Instagram (Optional)

Qualifications:

- Experience in video editing and production.
- Ability to create clear, engaging, and informative content.
- Understanding of audience attention spans and readability.
- Creativity and ability to produce engaging videos that capture and maintain viewer interest.

How to Apply:

Please submit your resume, portfolio, and a cover letter explaining how your skills and passion align with our needs. Highlight any relevant experience in video creation, especially with technical illustrations or edits.

Budget: $1,500
Posted On: June 14, 2024 14:16 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:YouTube Shorts, YouTube Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Content Writing
Skills: YouTube Shorts, YouTube Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Content Writing
Country: Romania
click to apply

The ideal candidate should have proven experience in video editing, specifically for social media platforms like Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, and YouTube. item.title: YouTube Video Editor (Long Form) - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for someone to do simple video editing for up to 30 minute long talking-head, screen share presentation, and video podcast-style interview videos.

I've been editing my own videos, and want to try outsourcing this.

I'm not looking for overproduced effects, graphics, or sound effects, mostly the following:
-Pick the best takes from raw footage
-Cut out long pauses or annoying filler phrases like "um"
-Add music
-Add a short brand logo clip

If you can do the following as well, it would be a bonus:
-Publish the video on YouTube with SEO in mind:
-Create thumbnails
-Create a captivating title
-Add a relevant description & tags
-Add relevant cards
-Add video to existing relevant playlist
-Add chapters

Here is an example video of what I'm looking for:
https://youtu.be/qn0E-RpCCgg?si=lAqM6wOUVGSOj7nv

If this is interesting, please send me a proposal with how much each 30-minute video would cost, and whether you can do publishing & thumbnail creation. I may also be making shorter videos.

I'll send you some raw footage just to do a short 20 to 30-second intro to see what your work looks like.

Thanks!
-Mark

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 14, 2024 14:09 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, YouTube Thumbnail, YouTube
Skills: Video Editing, YouTube Thumbnail, YouTube
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Video Editor For New Channel - Upwork
item.description:
I'm a relatively new YouTube content creator who wants to scale my content creation. My videos are in the commentary/pop culture space, and I've been editing videos myself but I'd want to put more of my energy into coming up with ideas and writing scripts.

The videos I make are a blend of talking head video, B-roll with voiceover. I'm looking for a great editor who can help me create these videos, and possibly elevate the quality of what I'm putting out.

The way I envision this working is I'd record the video and voiceovers, upload them into a shared Google drive folder and then the editor works their magic. I'd also provide any editing notes of things I want to feature or put emphasis on. The videos are typically less than 10 minutes long, but I'm hoping to start doing 1 long-form video a month.

I'm open to any skill level,  as long as you have the creativity and artistry to produce something great.

Thanks!




Posted On: June 14, 2024 14:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Elearning Video, Narrative Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Explainer Video, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Elearning Video, Narrative Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Explainer Video, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Country: South Africa

item.title: Looking for a Short-Form Video Editor in Harmozi Style - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled short-form video editor to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for detail and the ability to create engaging content that resonates with our audience. You will be responsible for editing, enhancing, and finalizing video content that is typically under 60 seconds.

Responsibilities:

- Edit and refine raw video footage to create concise and impactful narratives.
- Collaborate with directors and producers to align the final product with the project's vision.
- Utilize advanced editing software to add graphics, animations, and special effects.
- Ensure the final product meets industry standards for quality and consistency.
- Work under tight deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

Requirements:

- Relevant work experience in post-production with a focus on short-form content.
- Proficiency with video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, and Avid Media Composer.
- An advanced understanding of sound design and special effects.
- Excellent time management skills and the ability to meet project deadlines.
- Strong communication skills for effective collaboration with the production team.

Preferred Skills:

- Experience with 4K video editing and color grading.
- Ability to render and edit videos in 4K quality.
- Familiarity with YouTube's video standards and requirements.



Budget: $10
Posted On: June 14, 2024 13:46 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Graphic Design
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Graphic Design
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Video Editing Task - Upwork
item.description:
Hi, my name is Mark

I produce online courses about dog training.

I am looking for someone to create a testimonial video roughly 3-5 minutes long from a recording made on a 30-minute Zoom call recording with a client where she is providing me with feedback. The final result should not end-up looking like a zoom call, but a video testimonial of all the things the client likes about my online courses.

Should take 1-2 hours of work - please quote your fixed price for the task.

These video testimonials are a good example of the end result I want you to create from the editing: https://pianoin21days.com/testimonials

**Please only contact me via Upwork** and let me know what fixed price you would charge for this project.

Thanks

item.title: Geolayers 3 editor for youtube - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for an editor with experience and who is truly capable of creating perfect animated maps. First of all, nice to meet you, my name is Alessandro and together with my team we have many channels all in the geopolitical niche because it is what we are most passionate about. We recently opened a new channel, we already have an editor and we would like to add another to increase video production and be able to publish one a day, so the fundamental requirement is to be able to make 15 videos a month. Obviously then there is the possibility of being able to grow given that we often open new channels with our trusted editors, so we have a long-term vision and we like to create real friendships with our editors. The videos approximately range from 8 to 12 minutes, our budget per video is $50 per video, maybe write to me so we can discuss it even further. Obviously try to make them as similar as possible to the editor we already have, if you write to me I will send you the link to his videos so you can see if you are capable of recreating them similar or even better. For any questions do not hesitate to contact me... I would really appreciate your portfolio of animated maps that you have already created so I can take a look at them, thanks.
Alessandro :)

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 14, 2024 13:34 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: Italy

- Incorporate text overlays, graphics, and captions.
- Optimize reels for Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, and YouTube.
- Collaborate with the production team.

*Requirements:*
- Experience in video editing for social media.
- Proficiency with "Opus Clips" and video editing software.
- Understanding of social media trends.
- Strong attention to detail and creativity.
- Excellent communication and time management skills.
- Portfolio showcasing relevant work.

*Preferred Qualifications:*
- Experience with podcast content.
- Knowledge of Dubai's cultural landscape

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 14, 2024 13:31 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Video Editing, Audio Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Audio Post Production, Sound Mixing
Skills: Audio Editing, Video Editing, Audio Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Audio Post Production, Sound Mixing
Country: United States

item.title: Long-Form Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description

We are seeking an experienced long-form video editor to join our creative team. The ideal candidate will have a passion for storytelling and the technical skills to bring our vision to life. You will be responsible for editing, enhancing, and finalizing high-quality video content.

IF you can edit like this contact us now :

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kNMlvVCc6es

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gTkfDjUBXMY


Responsibilities:
- Edit and refine raw video footage to create compelling narratives.
- Collaborate with directors and producers to understand the project's vision.
- Utilize advanced editing software to add graphics, animations, and special effects.
- Ensure the final product meets industry standards for quality and consistency.
- Work under tight deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

Requirements:
- A bachelor’s degree in film studies, production, video editing, visual effects, cinematography, graphic design, or a related field.
- Relevant work experience in post-production with a focus on long-form content.
- Proficiency with video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, and Avid Media Composer.
- An advanced understanding of sound design and special effects.
- Excellent time management skills and the ability to meet project deadlines.
- Strong communication skills for effective collaboration with the production team.

Preferred Skills:

- Experience with 4K video editing and color grading.
- Ability to render and edit videos in 4K quality.
- Familiarity with YouTube's video standards and requirements.



Budget: $20
Posted On: June 14, 2024 13:26 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Country: India
click to apply
